column5: I took 2 high school kids out on the lake as I had a 2 hour window to do something this afternoon.  I caught the first fish in 20ft of water.  A respectable 2 to 2.5 pound fish.  I told the boys that if I get another bite I would let them bring it in and sure enough I got another bite.  As soon as I set the hook I handed the rod off to one of the boys.  The fish turned out to be a real hawg.  I have fished for and caught lots of smallies but this was the fattest I have ever seen.  Pics don't do it justice.  It was a heavy fish and was she was obviously packing it on for the winter.  It too was caught in about 20 ft of water.  What a football.  The kid loved it. the last two pics are of the same fish.
Wow!  :w00t:  That's the fattest smallmouth i've ever seen!  Congrats!
That fish is massive.  Looks ready to burst.
Yeah it was heavy.  The scary thing is that is was trying to eat more. lol
FATTY!!
Great report and pics Cudz  Good on you to take a couple of kids fishing and catch an oversize football bronze back  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice chunky Smallies, glad that the boys had a good time...
LOL Check out the smile you put on that young lads face,Priceless  What a HOG !!  Congrats and thanx for sharing cheers Streamerguy
wow monster fish!!!  how much did that thing weigh?
real nice hawg!
wow absolutely massive smallie, that thing must have been atleast 7 pounds.
I didn't have a scale with me.  It was fat, that is all I know.  I named it big girtha.  lol  Must be pushing 6.
WOW, that was a fat fish.
unreal, what a HOG!
That reminds me that Thanksgiving is next week. I better find my Big-Boy pants.
I concur, easily fattest, girthiest smallmouth i ever have seen.  Fricken amazing, ehg
He is freakin H-U-G-E !!!!!   awesome fish man congrats...
I have never seen a Bass that fat.It is one well fed bass
what a chunk
PIGLET!!!  good report thanks
thats one fat pig congrats
WOW!      beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeelch!     That was rude but I'm really quite impressed with that catch
